i.name: Moonsilver Blade
i.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

q.name: Crescent Strike
q.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.

w.name: Pale Cascade
w.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.

e.name: Moonfall
e.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.

r.name: Lunar Rush
r.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.

i1.blurb: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Casting an ability grants '''Diana''' {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Moonfall.png|20px|link=]] Moonfall's Rank|key=%|6|30;50 to 90|0 to 5|displayformula=30%+(10% at rank 1)+(10%*Moonfall's Rank)}} {{sti|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for her next 3 [[basic attack]]s.

Every third basic attack within {{fd|3.5}} seconds cleaves nearby enemies for {{pp|18|20|25|30|35|40|50|60|70|80|90|105|120|135|155|175|200|225|250|displayformula= 15+5 per level up to level 5, then+10 up to level 10,+15 up to level 13,+20 up to level 15, and+25 up to level 18|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|(15% AP)}} {{as|mana}}}}.
i1.name: Moonsilver Blade
notes: * The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} will not interact with ''Moonsilver Blade's'' damage.

** {{Pending for test}}: Diana will not generate stacks or consume the empowered attack if her autoattacks are {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, or if they {{tip|blind|miss}}.
* Diana's target may {{si|Flash}} out of the AoE as it has a slightly delayed effect.
* ''Moonsilver Blade'' has a visible counter just like {{ai|Double Strike|Master Yi}} and {{ai|Headshot|Caitlyn}}.
** Each attack has a distinct animation and her blade will glow when the empowered attack is ready.
* The area of effect is centered on Diana and not her target.

riot.name: Moonsilver Blade
riot.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

q1.blurb: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' unleashes a bolt of lunar energy that travels in an arc, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit and afflicting them with ''Moonlight'' for 3 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of them for the duration.
q1.name: Crescent Strike

riot.name: Crescent Strike
riot.description: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
riot.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

w1.blurb: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' {{tip|shield|shields}} herself for up to 5 seconds and creates three spheres that orbit her for the duration, detonating upon contact with an enemy and dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies upon detonation.
If all three spheres detonate, ''Pale Cascade's'' shield is reapplied, stacking with its original shield, and its duration is refreshed.
leveling: {{st|Shield Strength|{{ap|40 to 100}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Shield Strength|{{ap|40*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}{{st|Magic Damage per Orb|{{ap|22 to 70}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|22*3 to 70*3}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Pale Cascade
notes: * ''Pale Cascade'' has no cast time and does not interrupt Diana's previous orders.

riot.name: Pale Cascade
riot.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
riot.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

e1.blurb: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Increases the {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} gained from {{ai|Moonsilver Blade|Diana}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' {{tip|sight|reveals}} and {{tip|airborne|draws}} nearby enemies up to 225 units toward her location, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds afterwards.
e1.name: Moonfall
notes: * Enemies stay in the area for a maximum of approximately {{fd|0.5}} seconds while being pulled towards Diana.

riot.name: Moonfall
riot.description: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade to {{ e3 }}%.

Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Diana''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}}.
If the target is afflicted with {{ai|Crescent Strike|Diana|Moonlight}}, the effect is consumed on all enemies and ''Lunar Rush's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reset.
r1.name: Lunar Rush
notes: * If Diana is next to her target when ''Lunar Rush'' is cast it will place her on the reverse side.
* ''Lunar Rush'' can be interrupted if Diana is hit with crowd control while dashing.
** If the target has the ''Moonlight'' debuff ''Lunar Rush's'' cooldown will still reset.
* If the target {{si|Flash|Flashes}} while Diana is dashing she will follow them to their new location.
* {{Pending for test}}: If ''Lunar Rush'' is blocked the ''Moonlight'' debuff is still consumed and therefore ''Lunar Rush's'' cooldown is still reset.

riot.name: Lunar Rush
riot.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
riot.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
